mapper.select: SELECT a.comment_content AS commentContent, a.create_time AS createTime, IFNULL( ROUND( ( a.distributionStar + a.qualityStar + a.serviceStar ) / 3 ), a.comment_level ) AS star, a.commentImage, b.head_photo AS headPhoto, IFNULL(b.nick_name, '匿名用户') AS nickname, b.user_phone as userPhone FROM order_comment a LEFT JOIN app_user b ON a.user_id = b.app_user_id WHERE a.isVisible =1 ORDER BY a.create_time DESC LIMIT 0,20

select order_comment_id AS commentId, user_id AS userId, reservation_id AS reservationId, star AS star, comment_content AS commentContent, commentImage AS commentImage, create_time AS createTime, remark AS remark FROM order_comment WHERE isVisible=1 AND staff_id=#{staffId}
mapper.update: UPDATE order_comment SET comment_image=#{photo} WHERE reservation_id=#{reservationId} AND user_id=#{userId}
